description: Bad Ass Michael Brandon walks Evan Matthews on a chain like a dog. He pours some beer in a dish for Matthews who slurps it up then opens his throat for Brandon's legendary monster. Once hard, Brandon throws Matthews on his back and fucks him balls-deep, opening his hole for Brandon's fist. Matthews gets on all fours and Brandon wastes no time power-fisting him to the elbow. Matthews begs for more and rewards Brandon with a huge rosebud - who's the Bad Ass now?
title: Bad Ass, Scene #02
